author: Ed Monk
title: 'We love these companies because they are dull'
text: My latest tip improves the odds in the stock market casino 'We love these companies because they are dull' Firms that make bricks, dry-clean clothes or make the plastic tubs for margarine feature in one of the best-performing UK funds No followers of fashion: Georgina Hamilton and George Godber have buolt an impressive track record. By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 7:52AM BST 08 Oct 2015
